TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReturnValueNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ReturnValueNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ReturnValueNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 Windows 运行时组件中方法的返回值名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the return value of a method in a Windows Runtime component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 组件中，方法的所有参数和返回值都必须具有名称。In a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component, all the parameters of a method and the return value must have names. 默认情况下， [Winmdexp （Windows 运行时元数据导出工具）](/dotnet/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool)将返回值命名为 "value"。By default, [Winmdexp.exe (Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool) gives the return value the name "value". 当你在使用 JavaScript 编写的 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用中使用组件时，可以使用此名称来检索返回值。When you use a component in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app written in JavaScript, you can use this name to retrieve the return value. 例如，假设某一组件定义了一个方法，该方法具有一个返回值和两个 `out` 参数（在 Visual Basic 中具有 特性的`ByRef` 参数）：For example, suppose a component defines a method that has a return value and two `out` parameters (`ByRef` parameters with the attribute in Visual Basic): ```csharp public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) As Integer … End Function ``` 从 JavaScript 调用函数时，可以通过默认名称（`value`）访问返回值：When you call the function from JavaScript, you can access the return value by its default name (`value`): ```javascript var data = [5, 13, 23, 37]; var results = SampleComponent.TestStuff.computeAverage(data); var formattedResults = "Min=" + results.minValue + ", Avg=" + results.value + ", Max=" + results.maxValue; ``` 如果已经有一个名为 "value" 的参数，则必须为返回值指定不同的名称。 或者，您可能只想使用一个更有意义的名称（如本示例中的 "average"）。Or you might simply want to use a more meaningful name (such as "average" in this example). 将 特性应用于方法，并指定新名称。Apply the attribute to your method and specify a new name. ```csharp [return: ReturnValueName("average")] public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) _ As Integer … End Function ```

related.span: 用 C# 和 Visual Basic 创建 Windows 运行时组件

span.span: Creating Windows Runtime Components in C# and Visual Basic

span.span: The name of the return value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 组件中为方法返回值指定的名称。

span.span: Gets the name that was specified for the return value of a method in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component.
The name of the method's return value.
